data.comment: The big names in today's match at Jan Breydel Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at Jan Breydel Stadium - Brugge kick-off to start the match.
The first-half has come to a close in Bruges.
In the minute 45, Jens Cools (Eupen) has received a yellow card from Nathan Verboomen.
The second-half is underway. Eupen with the kick-off.
In the minute 49, At Jan Breydel Stadium, Menno Koch has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Noa Lang.
Goal! Brugge extend their lead to 2-0 through Noa Lang.
In the minute 63, Eupen make their first substitution with Knowledge Musona replacing Gary Magnee.
The away team replace Mamadou Kone with Carlos Embalo.
Benat San Jose Gil (Eupen) is making a third substitution, with Jordi Amat replacing Jens Cools.
In the minute 77, Benat San Jose Gil is making the team's fourth substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Jonathan Heris replacing Amara Baby.
The away team have replaced Stef Peeters with Isaac Nuhu. This is the fifth substitution made today by Benat San Jose Gil.
At Jan Breydel Stadium, Hans Vanaken is shown a red card and sent off.
In the minute 80, David Okereke is replacing Krepin Diatta for the home team.
Goal! Brugge extend their lead to 3-0 through David Okereke.
Youssouph Badji is on a sub for Noa Lang for Brugge.
